snippet: For the second time in three games, the Yankees faced a Cy Young Award winner and lost. This time, Ivan Nova was no match for Detroit’s ace, Justin Verlander.
abstract: Detroit Tigers beat the New York Yankees, 7-2.
lead_paragraph: For the second time in three games, the Yankees faced a Cy Young Award winner and lost. This time, Ivan Nova was no match for Detroit’s ace, Justin Verlander.

headline.seo: Tigers’ Verlander Fans 14 and Beats Yankees
headline.main: Verlander Dominates the Yankees While Nova Proves Ineffective Again
headline.print_headline: Verlander Dominates the Yankees While Nova Proves Ineffective Again
